00031 
00035 template <class T>
00036 class RTMatrixRow{
00038     T *row;
00039 public:
00041     inline RTMatrixRow(T *row){
00042         this->row = row;
00043     }
00045     inline T &operator[](int col)const{
00046         return row[col];
00047     }
00048 };
00049 
00050 
00051 template <class T> class RTMatrixT;
00052 template <class T> class RefMatrixT;
00053 template <class T> class MatrixT;
00054 
00055 
00057 template <class T>
00058 class _pRTMatrix_ {
00059 public:
00061     uint32 n;
00062 
00064     uint32 m;
00065 
00067     T *data;
00068 
00070     T **row;
00071 
00073     inline T *Data()const{
00074         return data;
00075     }
00076 
00079     inline uint32 DataSize()const{
00080         return n*m;
00081     }
00082 
00083 };

00459 template <class T1,class T2>
00460 inline bool RTMCopy(RTMatrixT<T1> &dest, const RTMatrixT<T2> &src){
00461     if (dest.m != src.m) return False;
00462     if (dest.n != src.n) return False;
00463 
00464     uint32 sz = src.DataSize();
00465     RTM__vecCopy(dest.data,src.data,sz);
00466 
00467     return True;
00468 }
00469 
00471 template <class T1,class T2>
00472 inline bool RTMLoad(RTMatrixT<T1> &dest,const T2 *src, const uint32 nRows,const uint32 nColumns){
00473     if (dest.m != nColumns) return False;
00474     if (dest.n != nRows) return False;
00475 
00476     uint32 sz = dest.DataSize();
00477     RTM__vecCopy(dest.data,src,sz);
00478 
00479     return True;
00480 }

00484 inline bool RTMSave(RTMatrixT<T1> &src,T2 *dest, const uint32 nRows,const uint32 nColumns){
00485     if (src.m != nColumns) return False;
00486     if (src.n != nRows) return False;
00487 
00488     uint32 sz = src.DataSize();
00489     RTM__vecCopy(dest,src.data,sz);
00490     return True;
00491 }

00495 class RTMatrixT:public _pRTMatrix_<T> {
00496 
00497 private:
00502     void Copy(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00503         if (A.data!=NULL){
00504             Allocate(A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00505             RTMLoad(*this,A.data,A.NRows(),A.NColumns());
00506         }
00507         else{
00508             Initialize();
00509         }
00510     }
00511             
00512 public:
00514     bool Allocate(const uint32 nRows,const uint32 nColumns){
00515         return RTMAllocate(*this,nRows,nColumns);
00516     }
00517 
00519     void DeAllocate(){
00520         if (this->data != NULL) free((void *&)this->data);
00521         if (this->row  != NULL) free((void *&)this->row);
00522         Initialize();
00523     }
00524 
00526     void Initialize(){
00527         this->data = NULL;
00528         this->row = NULL;
00529         this->n = 0;
00530         this->m = 0;
00531     }
00532 
00534     RTMatrixT(){
00535         Initialize();
00536     }
00537 
00539     inline void SwapRows(uint32 row_i, uint32 row_j){
00540         T temp;
00541         T *Rowi = this->row[row_i];
00542         T *Rowj = this->row[row_j];
00543         for(int i=0;i<this->m;i++){
00544             temp  = Rowj[i];
00545             Rowj[i] = Rowi[i];
00546             Rowi[i] = temp;
00547         }
00548     }
00549 
00550 public:
00552     inline RTMatrixT(const uint32 nRows,const uint32 nColumns){
00553         Allocate(nRows,nColumns);
00554     }
00555 
00557     inline RTMatrixT(const uint32 nRows,const uint32 nColumns,const T *source){
00558         Allocate(nRows,nColumns);
00559         RTMLoad(*this,source,nRows,nColumns);
00560     }

00608     inline void Clear(){
00609         T *p = this->data;
00610         T *pEnd = p + (this->n*this->m);
00611         while(p<pEnd){
00612             *p++ = (T)0;
00613         }
00614     }

00627     inline bool Product(const RTMatrixT &A,const RTMatrixT &B){
00628         if (A.m != B.n) return False;
00629         if (this->n != A.n) return False;
00630         if (this->m != B.m) return False;
00631         RTMProduct_U(*this,A,B);
00632         return True;
00633     }

00637         if (A.m != this->m) return False;
00638         if (A.n != this->n) return False;
00639         RTMDotProduct_U(*this,A);
00640         return True;

00644     inline bool Sum(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,const RTMatrixT<T> &B){
00645         if (A.m != this->m) return False;
00646         if (A.n != this->n) return False;
00647         if (B.m != this->m) return False;
00648         if (B.n != this->n) return False;
00649         RTMSum_U(*this,A,B);
00650         return True;

00654     inline bool Diff(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,const RTMatrixT<T> &B){
00655         if (A.m != this->m) return False;
00656         if (A.n != this->n) return False;
00657         if (B.m != this->m) return False;
00658         if (B.n != this->n) return False;

00660         return True;

00666     inline bool Combine(const RTMatrixT<T> &A,const T aw,const RTMatrixT<T> &B,const T bw){
00667         if (A.m != this->m) return False;
00668         if (A.n != this->n) return False;
00669         if (B.m != this->m) return False;
00670         if (B.n != this->n) return False;

00686     inline bool Transpose(const RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00687         if (A.m != this->n) return False;
00688         if (A.n != this->m) return False;

00690         return True;

00694     inline bool Invert(RTMatrixT<T> &A){
00695         if (this->n != this->m) return False;
00696         if (A.m != this->m) return False;
00697         if (A.n != this->n) return False;
00698         return RTMInvert_U(*this,A);
